    Reference

    All functions

    as.glider()

    Convert data to glider format

    degreeMinute()

    Convert lon and lat from a combined degree+minute formula

    glider-class glider

    A class to hold glider information

    gliderDebug()

    Print a debugging message

    handleFlags(<glider>)

    Handle Flags in glider Objects

    navStateCodes()

    Possible navState values of a glider object

    oceGlider-class

    oceGlider: A Package for Processing Ocean Glider Data

    plot(<glider>)

    Plot an oceGlider Object

    plotGlider()

    Plot a glider Object

    read.glider()

    Read a glider data file

    read.glider.netcdf()

    Read a glider file in netcdf format

    read.glider.netcdf.ioos()

    Read a glider file in netcdf IOOS format

    read.glider.seaexplorer.delayed()

    Read delayed-mode SeaExplorer glider data

    read.glider.seaexplorer.realtime()

    Read real-time SeaExplorer glider data

    read.glider.slocum()

    Read a Slocum Glider file

    read.glider.slocum.netcdf()

    Read a glider file in a Slocum netcdf format

    setFlags(<glider>)

    Set data-quality flags within a glider object

    `[[`(<glider>)

    Retrieve Part of a glider Object

    subset(<glider>)

    Subset a glider Object

    summary(<glider>)

    Summarize a glider Object

    toCamelCase()

    Convert a string from snake_case to camelCase

    urlExists()

    Check whether a URL exists, backtracing by separators, if not
